title: CRM Specialist - Brazil
summary:
The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it!

We are seeking a motivated CRM Specialist to join our growing business. This role will manage key accounts across Brazil and Chile, driving the performance of Apple products across sales channels. The successful candidate is proactive and passionate about the digital world and is able to thrive in a fast paced, complex environment. You will negotiate, plan and implement base management projects with eCommerce, Carriers, Premium and Omnichannel Retailers. In addition, you will partner with local sales, digital programs and marketing teams to align on the best CRM strategy to maximize Apple’s opportunities on partners' platform.

Please submit your resume in English.
description:
- Manage key accounts with CRM strategy to negotiate, plan and execute base management projects. Partner closely with account executives to identify CRM opportunities and implement strategy to support account plan and forecast.
- In partnership with the marketing team, manage marketing budget and plan advertising campaigns and approval of creatives.
- Create business briefs for marketing team to translate requirements into creative partner campaigns.
- Develop and implement base management programs taking advantage of partner’s CRM tools and capabilities. 
- Build insights and optimize partner campaigns to improve results, focusing on customer experience data and campaign results.
preferred_qualifications:
Excellent interpersonal skills
Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple tasks concurrently
Bachelors Degree or equivalent work experience
